sections.Biography:
===Background===
He was a fisherman from [[Lannisport]] conscripted into the force led by Ser [[Stafford Lannister]].

===[[Season 2]]===
He participates in the [[Battle of Oxcross]], in which his leg is wounded. He is treated for an infected wound by [[Talisa Stark|Talisa Maegyr]]. Though he begs for her not to, she amputates the leg, telling him that not doing so would kill him. [[Robb Stark]], who had noticed Talisa, helps to hold him down, forcing him to bite down onÂ a piece of leather. Afterward, he is loaded onto a cart and taken away.

Talisa blames Robb for the boy losing his leg, explaining that he isn't responsible for the death of [[Eddard Stark]] and isn't friends with King [[Joffrey Baratheon]], and that he was a fisherman from Lannisport before they forced a spear in his hand. Robb tells Talisa that the boy was lucky she was there, but she says he was unlike Robb was.<ref>"[[Garden of Bones]]"</ref>
